website_summaries.verdict: The design on these water shoes keeps pebbles from getting in, making them great for navigating rivers and lakes.
pros: Protects the feet and dries quickly
These shoes are true water sports shoes
Very nice for the beach and the boat
cons: These water shoes do not have  good arch support which would be best for a lot of pavement walking

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Attractive Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lady wearing these shoes on a recent vacation and was impressed with how attractive and useful these “water shoes” were. I had to have a pair, or three pairs! I wear a size 7 shoe and ordered the same size in these shoes. I got the pink (blush), mint green, and black ones to go with various swimsuits.
customer_reviews.author: LittleCH

customer_reviews.title: A little too big
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but haven't worn them in the water yet. I ordered my normal size 7.5, but a 7 would have been better (I have narrow feet) but not enough to pay the extra $13.
customer_reviews.author: M pdx

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoes for water aerobics, not designed to be worn as a regular shoe or sandal. Ordered a 7, but wish I had a 6.5, these shoes run true to size if you have ever worn Jambu brand.
customer_reviews.author: camper

customer_reviews.title: but comfortable when not standing for long period of time
customer_reviews.text: Ok, no arch support, but comfortable when not standing for long period of time. I would recommend these shoes for working out only.
customer_reviews.author: Suze  Louis

customer_reviews.title: Shoes ok for my water aerobics, not much in ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes ok for my water aerobics, not much in the way of support though and a bit wide across the closure area. Cute though... And its all about being cute :-)
customer_reviews.author: MtnJan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoes to slip on for running errands, going to the beach, pool, or wherever.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE W.

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes but mine weren’t perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are what I expected from Jambu and I definitely love the style, but the shoes I got were torn from the back. I love them but I’m gonna return and hope to get ones that are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Previous owner of Jambu shoes. Love them and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Diva1980

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable! What else could a girl want
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable! What else could a girl want?! :-) I've used this shoe to go in creeks, rivers, and rocky beaches. Worked very well for me....
customer_reviews.author: Viviene

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the pool 4-5 times a week and these fit better and have a nice Velcro strap that makes them easy to get off and on. This is my third pair! They’re so cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best water shoes I have ever worn. Easy to get on and off because of the Velcro opening. Being used on a water bile and they protect well from the cages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing customer

customer_reviews.title: soooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: these are so well put together ! very durable and so very comfy !!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Find yourself more supportive pool shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy! The picture looks like it has a supportive but it is just a nice design.
customer_reviews.author: yvette beausoleil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are light and comfortable as if i'm bare foot love them TR
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Defective insole
customer_reviews.text: One insole was the original and the other was cut one inch shorter by someone else. Had to use insoles from another brand to use these shoes. Clearly a return pair that was not checked out. Sorry I didn't catch it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: and all was good fit wise and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Tried them on upon receipt, and all was good fit wise and comfort. Have not worn in water, season nearly over here in Ohio!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: but really sad I couldn't exchange them
customer_reviews.text: They were quite large. There is absolutely no support of any kind, but I guess you don't need much to wear them in the water. Very cute shoes, but really sad I couldn't exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: OsborneOddities

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Not durable! Started falling apart after the send day of light wear on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Waluzak

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 1/2 I ordered a 6 and it fit perfect. The reviews help me to order the right
customer_reviews.text: On the reviews they talk about the size to be a little large I'm 6 1/2 I ordered a 6 and it fit perfect. The reviews help me to order the right size
customer_reviews.author: Luz H.

customer_reviews.title: Strap does NOT stay secure
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great water aerobics shoe IF the strap stayed secure in the water. The comfort and support are excellent but this shoe is useless when you have to stop and redo the strap every time you move your foot in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wile

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable though not much support so can't stand or walk for long periods
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a water therapy class and they fit wetland do what was expected of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Shoes a cute but had to return because they are too big !
customer_reviews.author: Saidyah

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: part of the design was worn off when they arrived
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Water shoes. Comfortable water shoes. No problems. Seems they will stay on when wet.The velcro easily tightens the shoes as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The are nice quality but the valcro comes undone when doing kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore one day and they are already falling apart on the top
customer_reviews.author: Kayte Jay

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. So comfy and very durable. Bought 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Sue0729

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice, a little roomy. Hope it works well in water
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: like bare foot with protection for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs now, like bare foot with protection for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: broke down and had holes by end of third day.
customer_reviews.author: mrsdrdahl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This shoe does not have enough support, I will send back.
customer_reviews.author: Chunk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but I wish the sizing was a little more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottom was like felt. Didn't seem like they'd be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit fine. Unfortunately they only had this color available
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine. Unfortunately they only had this color available. Good for water but really quite ugly if you ask me! Sometimes you just have to choose utility over beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Gee

customer_reviews.title: It's fine would like to return it for a
customer_reviews.text: It's fine would like to return it for a .5 size but afraid it will not get here on time for my vacation 😏
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

product_meta.title: JSport by Jambu Women's Mermaid Monk Strap Flat
product_meta.description:
Water ready

The water shoe perfected, and it makes a cool factor of the new tech design and use of unexpected color. Waterproof and beach ready. Sand to souvenir shopping.
